> Elita started to cry in silence while Kup Hugged her tightly.

Lord Elder looked over at Elita, his own heart troubled by her tears.
However he was never good with dealing with young ones. He could deal
with scientific and engineering formula all day. He could even run
through combat to save an innocent, but the crying of a young one
seemed beyond his ability to deal with.

He glanced at Kup, silently asking him to deal with Elita as he helped
Tuscon to sit. "Perhaps we get can get you a feed line as we all
talk?" he said to Tuscon, trying to cover up his own feelings of
unease.

(TAG)

Preston
